title: Martin King and the Space Angels
description: Martin King is in love with Darcy Williams, but he is afraid to tell her his true feelings.One evening, he is walking home with Darcy and his cousin Tommy when an alien approaches them. His name is Falcon, and he is a member of a race called the Axis Lords. Falcon explains that an evil force called XO5 is looking for an object of great value on Earth. He gives the teenagers special powers and tells them that they must find the object before XO5.The teenagers soon find themselves involved in a massive, universal conspiracy. Somehow, Martin is at the centre of it all. But who really is the mysterious XO5 â€“ and what does he want with Martin?Martin King and the Space Angels is the first book in the Martin King trilogy.
author: James Thorpe
